name: Mouse Tail
description:
The clockwork mouse has lost its tail. You have to help the mouse to reach its tail at the end of the map by controlling it using:

Left and Right arrow keys to move left and right and space bar to jump.

 Press the space bar while touching walls to climb them and press space bar while touching ceilings to stick to them.

Your winding goes down continuously.Rewind the clockwork mouse by collecting keys.

Try your  best to Avoid spikes as a poke can hurt you. You can regain back the health by collecting the first aid kits.
